body.p: Excellency Beriah McGoffin Governor of the state of Ky

Your Petitioners the petit Jury to ^who^ tried the case of the Commonwealth against James Young in the Hart Equity & criminal court would most respectfully state that said Young is very young in years and from his youth & appearance we would Judge, by not a confirmed felon and although we under our oaths as persons & his confession of his guilt were bound to send him to the penetiary for 12 months we earnestly petition Your excellency to pardon him, beleiving that by your pardon after his conviction he will be a better member of society than if he is compelled to serve out his time in the penitentiary of this state

G. W. Blakey
Neal Brown
Thos Hardy
Jesse Fuqua
G W S Bundel
James.H. Locke
M L Lester
R G King
B F Buckey
Riley Chancy
Booker Wheat
James M. Buckner
